paragraphs.text: Zuko accidentally dropped ice cream on Mai.

paragraphs.body: Ice cream is a frozen ${link_0} sold in tropical areas of the ${link_1}, such as the beaches on ${link_2}. It contains milk and flavoring and is served in a waffle cone to prevent it from dripping.
paragraphs.text: Ice cream is a frozen dessert sold in tropical areas of the Fire Nation, such as the beaches on Ember Island. It contains milk and flavoring and is served in a waffle cone to prevent it from dripping.

paragraphs.body: While they were relaxing on an Ember Island beach, ${link_0} bought ${link_1} an ice cream cone in an attempt to please her. However, he accidentally dropped it onto her lap, and she sarcastically thanked him, remarking that it was "really refreshing".
paragraphs.text: While they were relaxing on an Ember Island beach, Zuko bought Mai an ice cream cone in an attempt to please her. However, he accidentally dropped it onto her lap, and she sarcastically thanked him, remarking that it was "really refreshing".
